Review.Titre: My order was wrong I was givin the…
Review.Contenu: My order was wrong I was givin the wrong size in gloves I've emailed them and haven't received a response back

Review.Titre: I ordered larges and got mediums at…
Review.Contenu: I ordered larges and got mediums at best.  It's a shame because keks are my favorite and I was excited to glove at bass canyon but now I probably won't touch my gloves until I get the chance to find gloves that fit. Also tried emailing about the issue with no luck.

Review.Titre: 5 out of 5 except for shipping delays…
Review.Contenu: 5 out of 5 except for shipping delays from USPS.

Great pricing, fast shipping.  My only complaint is I had chosen PayPal for payment, however your site automatically charged my charge card. The company has responded very quickly with some help regarding the issue, which is refreshing and makes me want to do more business with them! Thank you for your time and assistance.

Package came relatively quick despite ordering during the holiday time. Got 2 pairs of gloves for my squad and absolutely loved that they sent little sprouts in the pack. Little unexpected things like that show just how grateful a company is to their customers.My boys absolutely loved the gift and seeing my one boy do glove shows an hour after getting his gift made it all worth it.
Love the customer service, and the quality of gloves set (apollo2s). Amazing experience all in all

Review.Titre: The chips are smaller than I imagined ❤️
Review.Contenu: The chips are smaller than I imagined, and I am in love!!!! I have tiny hands, and finally there is a chip that is comfortable with my tiny hands!!!! ❤️
Tysm Throwlights, I got my new pair of gloves just in time to celebrate my upcoming birthday! The gloves are incredible as anticipated! Came thru clutch❤️

This product is amazing! Compared to the spectra’s I purchased from Emazing lights, these are far superior in comfort and quality. The color patterns are what makes my shows different from others. Thank you for your support and I will be recommending this brand to The rest of my my rave family and friends.

The throwlights team was very helpful, open to feedback and responded to all my emails and DMs regarding my order and expected delivery times. Kept me updated on items that weren’t available to ship and I received everything I needed within a week of placing the order.

Review.Titre: This company has the best customer…
Review.Contenu: This company has the best customer service and it’s ran by actual humans who themselves are dedicated and passionate for what they do. Every email I’ve exchanged has been personal, knowledgeable, and supportive. They live and breath for their products and are always willing to go the extra mile.

Review.Titre: Besides the fact that you guys were out…
Review.Contenu: Besides the fact that you guys were out of cr1225s, I had a speedy delivery to my mailbox. Can always count on you guys for that refresh for festival season, although this time i needed batts but y'all were out. Had to resort to alternative methods.

The gloves fit amazing! The chips are nice and comfortable on the finger tips. I haven’t learned how to change the settings to customize myself, but with the helpful instructions I should be able to get it. Took them to their first rave this past weekend and the preset colors did the dang thing! Would definitely Recommend. PLUR
Service was quick, shipping was fast, and product was as expected with a few unexpected additions and a kind note! Highly recommended for all of your flow art needs :)

Review.Titre: The owner of Throwlights went above and…
Review.Contenu: The owner of Throwlights went above and beyond to make sure I got my package on time before a show. Really showed me he truly cares about customers. Will be shopping here whenever I need any accessories for flow arts!

My stuff is always shipped insanely fast and I’ve never been missing an item. Bulbs are amazing. Batteries are great. Best-fitting whites I’ve found. The little plant clip y’all sent this time was cute AF. I literally could not possibly complain.

Love this company! Fast shipping, they have cheap batteries, and they gave me a little bonus in the mail because I was headed to electric forest! I appreciate them so much! Had a great time melting faces at forest and everyone asked me where I got my gloves from.

Shipping is always fast and everything always shows up as described. Products are incredible- the LEDs are amazing, and I love the Apollos for an easy to use programmable option. I feel no need to get my lights anywhere else.
Best company in development of gloves that feel like they aren’t even there. 10/10 would recommend to everyone asking me about getting into this art form.

Review.Titre: I ordered a new set for my next rave I…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a new set for my next rave I am going to and they are absolutely beautiful. The lights are very bright, they're beginner friendly and and I cannot wait to show them off. Great price for high quality lights and material as well!

Review.Titre: Order came quickly and was as expected
Review.Contenu: Order came quickly and was as expected. they also threw in a sticker and free gift which was much appreciated!
I accidentally purchased the wrong glove size, I emailed support and they sent me the correct sized ones free of charge! Also the freebies that were included with my order were sick!
throwlights made my experience so amazing everything was perfect cant wait to melt faces :)
They were able to take the specific need I had for a science demo and tell me the exact item I needed.
i ordered some batteries for my gloves and they came so fast and also came with some cute little goodies in the bag! y’all are awesome, thank you :)
Hassel free, quick ship. Working batteries. Thank you

Review.Titre: Absolutely awesome product and the fact…
Review.Contenu: Absolutely awesome product and the fact that I had a hand written note on there was awesome. Many many more purchases to come
Absolutely love the gloves and the battery life on them is spectacular!  Overall, great buy!

Review.Titre: Wish you had more clothing so I could…
Review.Contenu: Wish you had more clothing so I could of repped at bass canyon still gave the plug for batts and skins though

Review.Titre: I had order a Kek care package
Review.Contenu: I had order a Kek care package, 5 sheets of cr1212s & 5 pairs of whites, the same day they were already shipped out. Came maybe 2 days later. Speedy service and the quality is always DANK

Review.Titre: batteries were cheap and came on time

Review.Contenu: Always very helpful and knowledgeable. Very good customer service. W glove,JH

Review.Titre: Great for small hands/ sweating/ stretching!
Review.Contenu: These gloves fit the best on me out of all brands. I have really small hands and I’m able to stretch them out as I need with my lights on. Also, when my hands sweat, they hug my hands rather than just slip off like others.
Great customer service, they added sprouts to my order to give out at my next music festival
Product is great, customer service is great!  Thanks for being so responsive and proactive!
Delivery came promptly and they provide great service and informaton.

Review.Titre: Very fast. Good quality. Good company❤️
Review.Contenu: I ordered batteries and gloves. They came within 2 days with a cute sticker and clip. Great service❤️🙏🏼

Review.Titre: Always very helpful and spend the time…
Review.Contenu: Always very helpful and spend the time to help you. Everyone has a very thorough knowledge of the products. They will do whatever they can to help!
Quick delivery, good products
Really good great service and amazing product!

Review.Titre: Great business to do business with
Review.Contenu: Great business to do business with, would recommend anyone. Thank you
Easy access, straight to the light show. No difficulties upon arrival.
Lights came in on time. Every thing was how I ordered it. And I'm having fun using them. Very satisfied.

Review.Titre: Not having to worry about settings…
Review.Contenu: Not having to worry about settings things up and ready to glove! Thanks guys for all that you do:)
Excellent customer service, they make sure you’re happy.
Great product, fast shipping AAA+++

Review.Titre: These lights are the real deal!
Review.Contenu: Everything came in really quick and the brightness and colors on the Apollo v2 are on point! Love these glove!
great packaging, great items, fast delivery. stellar
Got my order in on time and they even tossed in a free little gift!
